data.md:MetaData: Mid-Atlantic Expedition 2004, Cruise No. 60, Leg 3, 14 January - 14 February 2004 - Mineralogical, geochemical, and biological investigations of hydrothermal systems on the Mid-Atlantic Ridge between 14°45' N and 15°05' N (HYDROMAR I), 14 January - 14 February 2004, Fort-de-France - Fort-de-France (Martinique)
